QuestData.Title: Peeking into the Portal
QuestData.Description: I sent Scout Pazerp to get a better look at the portal. She should have reported back by now; what could be taking her so long?$b$bShe is one of my best scouts, I hope she is alright.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Scout Pazerp and use her telescope.
QuestData.RewardText: Poor Pazerp... this news is unsettling to say the least. The Iron Horde seems to have an unending supply of troops.
